game.app
Class Board

java.lang.Object
  game.app.Board

public class Board
extends Object

This class defines the 4x4 Tic Tac Toe board. It also has methods to evaluate if the game is over and if so returns the winner.

Author:
Kedar Kulkarni

getLegalMoves

public List<Integer> getLegalMoves()
Returns All the Legal Moves remaining on the board. The values are returned as a List containing array of empty positions.

isOver

public Boolean isOver()
Check if the game is complete. The game would be complete if we have a definite winner or if all positions on the board are filled

Returns:
